data.message: MY NAME IS Eminem and I just DON'T GIVE A FUCK I aint no ROLE MODEL or SUPERMAN but that just THE WAY I AM; there no music BUSINESS - WITHOUT ME so go ahead and LOSE YOURSELF in my music or better still hater JUST LOSE IT, becuase WHEN IM GONE I dont think anyone will applause or call for an ENCORE, YOU DONT KNOW what its like to live with an EVIL TWIN or a fuckin MONSTER inside you - Im referring to the REAL SLIM SHADY not MARSHALL MATHERS, but despite that shit IM NOT AFRAID if critics turn on me even fans... and STAN - I LOVE THE WAY U LIE about all the promises I didnt make, and U went BERZERK calculating all that shit up in your BRAINLESS head, but fuck it Im a RAP GOD, the fuck do I care if I dont get NO LOVE, put my GUTS OVER FEAR and shoot to the moon Im SPACE BOUND and I hope for SURVIVAL so get this piece of feeling and SMACK THAT over your head U fuckers... Il DROP THE WORLD on you for ridiculing MY LIFE and thats just a WARNING call me an ASSHOLE or a BAD GUY but with you out the way IM STRONGER THAN I WAS
